message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.CY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses security threats and countermeasures for the CAN bus communication protocol in modern vehicles. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and software engineering (cs.SE) as the paper proposes a solution to address security vulnerabilities. The paper also touches upon system and control theory (cs.SY) as it discusses the implications of a human driver on the security of the proposed solution. Additionally, the paper involves cryptography and security (cs.CY) as it discusses packet-injection attacks and denial of service attacks. Finally, the paper involves networking and internet architecture (cs.NI) as it discusses the communication protocol used in modern vehicles.
